name: market for bulk carrier, for dry goods | bulk carrier, for dry goods | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21044/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'bulk carrier, for dry goods', in the Global geography.;No transport is considered in this market. Potential transfer from the shipyard to the port of registry is neglected.;This product is a mobile infrastructure that is used in the service of transportation of goods. The bulk carrier, for dry goods has a load capacity (DWT) of 51,000 tonnes and an assumed lifetime of 25 years.

This activity begins with the ship at the gate of the shipyard.

This activity ends with the ship ready for use.
category: C:Manufacturing/30:Manufacture of other transport equipment/301:Building of ships and boats/3011:Building of ships and floating structures
